description:
The battle for micro-world domination
isnâ€™t over yet! Escape the Virus, an
action puzzle series, is back with new
modes. In the 'shooter mode' shoot
down hordes of vicious viruses, while
in the 'territory mode' prevent enemies
from getting too close to certain
zones. Get into the ultimate warfare
and kick viruses out of the
micro-world for good!
name:
Escape the Virus:
Shoot'Em Up!
